Kichu. Sekhane kichu ache. Tai tar Sydney asa chara ar ki chhilo? Chikitsar jonno tar poramorsh ki chhilo? Tai tini poriksha chalano? Se kichui khujte payni.

Tai prai ek bochhor age, apani tar kache giyechilen. Tini poriksha chalano shuru korechen. Ebong kon byadhi khujte pai ni.
Na, se ekhono kichu khujte paini.
Eta ki shudhu ekta byadhi chhilo ja tumi bhebechhile tomar chhilo? Naki besh kichhu hoyeche,

Um, apni janen, ami miss er sathe shuru korechhilam. Ami eti somporkhe kichu jinish porechhilam ebong kivabe amar bosi manushder kache eti chhilo ebong tara emonki janena je tader kache eti ache ebong tarpor shob hothat korei tar jibon badle jay. Tai ami eti niye chintito chhilam. Ebong tarpor ami kichu poriksha ebong jinisgulo jonno onuman kori, ami onuman kori, bhabte shuru kori shomvobhob eti chhilo na ebong eti kichu chhilo na. Ami miss korechhi. Ami mone kori eti cancer. Je boroshel eka. Hain. Apani ki janen, jodi-o amar kichu uposorgo nei, apani janen, shudhu apanar modhe mithya bolte pare ebong apanar kono dharonai nei. Ebong matro ekdin, apani janen,
Apnar chikitsok, chikitsokra ei somosto byadhir jonno poriksha chalan korechen ke bhebechhilen apnar hoyeche? Amra mone kori
Se hain, hain. Kintu, ami bolte chachchi, jodi ami ek bochhor age je poriksha disechhilam? Eta jodi na dekhay tahole ki hobe karon eti eto gotor hote onothoi hoini. Ebong eti.
Tai ami dekchi apani chintito.
Hain.
Tai apani ek bochhor age ei bishoye prothombar moto chikitsokke dekhechilen. Ero age ki apnar udbeg ba udbeg chhilo?
Na, shudhu udbigno je shuru. Asustho chhilo je anubhuti peyechhilam. Tai ami ja niye chintito chhilam ta chhilam, tobe ta chhara ar kichu chhilo na.
Kintu apani asusthata niye chintito chhilen. Jodi othocho onyo kichu na. Apnar ki kono sharirik uposorgo ache?
Na.

Apani ki Internet forume shokkho achhen jekhane tara asusthata niye alochona kore tai,

Haan, haan, ami sekhane onek loker golpo porechi je kivabe tader ekta uposorg chhilo, kintu tara satyoi eti sambandhe kichu-i bhabe ni, apni janen, ebong tarpor tader ekta gurutôr roga nirnay hoyeche. Tai apni satyo post form porechen.

Haan, haan. Amar udveg sambandhe, ebong kokhono kokhono lokera amar sathe ekTu hatash hoy. Tara khub sundor na. Je sambandhe bolun. Shudhu karon ami satyoi kichu anubhav korchi na.
